reviewText: You will receive lots of good information with adequate and above average 3-D presentation with this film.

The Galactic Adventures Double Feature (3D Sun / Mars 3D) Blu-ray is an excellent addition to my 3D collection of space images. While not the same quality as the NASA 3D IMAX Blu-rays, it was still enjoyable and definitely worth the price I paid. I always love viewing authentic NASA footage in 3D.

I recommend this double feature to 3D techno-geeks everywhere. They go together for an afternoon's enjoyment that let's me forget the current events nonsense appearing in each day's newspaper articles. It's too bad there are no portable 3D tv sets. I can't haul my 3D HDTV out to the pool each afternoon to watch my other astronomy 3D movies.
Compared to Hollywood professional 3D movies, this 3D had ghosting issues. The story and narration were lacking expected information that we would have gotten from an IMAX or NASA video.

Being a 3D enthusiast, I bought this for that purpose, but was disappointed that only part of it was in 3D, and not very good at that.  Not recommended for anyone expecting a good 3D presentation of our galactic system.
asome
